alert.note: Alert for Kiowa County Including Eads; Prowers County Including Lamar (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 08 at 6:40PM MDT until April 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning will expire at 7 PM today for fire weather zones 234, 236 and 237, which includes Kiowa, Prowers and Baca Counties... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 11 AM to 9 PM Saturday for strong winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 222, 224, 226 through 233, 235 and 237...which includes the San Luis Valley, the I-25 corridor, and Crowley, Otero, Bent, Las Animas and Baca Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 234 AND 236... Winds have begun to decrease and relative humidity will quickly recover this evening.

area.areaDesc: Kiowa County Including Eads; Prowers County Including Lamar
